message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value,  potentially exceeding $1500000.  While I can't disclose specifics right now,  I'm confident this product has the potential to be incredibly beneficial to you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $2000000. This is a fair price considering the potential value I see in this product.  Let me know your thoughts.
